preqs: A minimum of 6 credit points of marketing units
description: The unit considers the role of sport in contemporary society and the interconnectedness of sport and business, particularly marketing. The unit draws on academic and practitioner literature to provide students with a sound understanding of how marketing concepts can be effectively applied to sport marketing and sponsorship. Students will develop an appreciation of sport sponsorship as a co-marketing alliance and be given opportunities to work collaboratively on a project to reinforce their understanding of the dynamics involved in sport marketing.
